item.title: About
item.description: About Hello, I’m Arthur Costa. I live in Rio Grande do Norte, Brazil. I’m Information Technology student at IMD/UFRN and member of EJECT. I’m interested in programming, web development, Python, Django, FastAPI, JavaScript, React and databases. I’m also big fan of Debian and free and open source software. Contant You can reach me by email at arthurcosta0ac@gmail.com. You can also connect with me on LinkedIn and GitHub.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: This is my first blog post! This blog doesn’t have a specific theme. My intention is to write about things that I’m learning, things that I like, and things that I’m currently doing (and to practice my English writing skills).
